Welcome to this installment of site news, where we look forward to another month of SCPs!

This is a series showing off news from the site, articles from the past month[[footnote]] with a rating above 0 [[/footnote]], and fan-content for you to check out and discover! Be sure to leave a comment with your thoughts!

++++ Featured Articles

* The featured articles for February were [[[SCP-2152]]] (Home‚Ñ¢) by acc1177, [[[Naptime]]] by eskobar, and [http://www.scp-wiki.net/16th-wondertainment-donation| Sixteenth Wondertainment Donation] by dr reach. The first is about a vaporwave loving statue head, the second is a tale of a child trying to get away from never ending staring eyes, and the third details the acquisition of the Fantastic Wonderbirds‚Ñ¢ by the Manna Charitable Foundation!

++++ Event Featured Articles

The theme for the month of February was //engraved!//

* In [[[SCP-2762]]] (Moon Snakes), by Anaxagoras, the president has to worry about a bit more than public opinion polls.

* In [[[SCP-1184]]] (Truth), by dragonnyxx, perception of reality is stretched to its absolute maximum.

* In [[[SCP-1418]]] (The Dowager's Comb), by SRegan, a Lady leaves behind a sinister legacy. If, of course, she even existed in the first place.
